title: Economy of Venezuela
summary: The economy of Venezuela is based primarily on petroleum[3][18] and has been in a state of total economic collapse since 2013.[19][20] Venezuela is the 8th largest member of OPEC and 26th in the world by oil production (List of countries by oil production). Since the 1920s, Venezuela has been a rentier state, offering oil as its main export.[21] The nation has experienced hyperinflation since 2015.
